pr_title: [GEOS-9680] WMTS othersSrs always add EPSG:4326 and shows wrong CRS code

timeline.message: [GEOS-9680] WMTS othersSrs always add EPSG:4326 and shows wrong CRS code

timeline.body: What happens when these fixed SRS names are used for cascading? Wondering if it might lead to an axis flip issue.
timeline.bodyText: What happens when these fixed SRS names are used for cascading? Wondering if it might lead to an axis flip issue.
timeline.bodyHTML: What happens when these fixed SRS names are used for cascading? Wondering if it might lead to an axis flip issue.
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: thanks for your point @aaime . Fixed this by leaving the urn format for CRS.
replies.author: taba90

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        List<String> otherSRS = Collections.emptyList();
```

Avoids an unchecked conversion warning (the method return type can use type inference, the constant cannot)
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
List<String> otherSRS = Collections.EMPTY_LIST;
List<String> otherSRS = Collections.emptyList();

Avoids an unchecked conversion warning (the method return type can use type inference, the constant cannot)
timeline.author: aaime
